entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters and a student at Hogwarts. He is described as having a stunned voice when he sees Viktor Krum.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character and a student at Hogwarts. She is described as saying that Viktor Krum is only a Quidditch player.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is a famous Quidditch player who is also a student at Hogwarts. He is described as one of the best Seekers in the world.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another main character and a student at Hogwarts. He is described as seeing Viktor Krum and being surprised that he is still at school.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is a school that has sent students to the party at Hogwarts. It is mentioned in relation to Viktor Krum.

relationships.description: Ron admires Viktor Krum as a Quidditch player and is surprised that he is still at school.
Hermione does not seem to think much of Viktor Krum, calling him only a Quidditch player.
Harry is surprised that Viktor Krum is still at school.
